comment.brief: Sets the current state to restore (may be null). This must be called prior to adding any children. The state contained here will only be used once. Each time a state must be restored `SavePreviewState` and `PreviewSetState` should be called again.
comment.full:
Sets the current state to restore (may be null). This must be called prior to adding any children. The state contained here will only be used once. Each time a state must be restored `SavePreviewState` and `PreviewSetState` should be called again.

@hide for Preview only
